PromotionInfo.Help: A 5th level unit may be promoted to chief for every 10 units you have of the same type. A chief may give command morale to units of his same type up to his level within level/8 range. This promotion will vanish when this unit is upgraded.

The most experienced unit of each class type may be promoted to grand master upon attaining level 6. There must be at least 12 units of like type in the world before a grand master can exist for the class.
Give command morale to up to his level units within units / 8 range.
Give command morale to up to his level x 2 units within units / 8 range.
Give command morale to up to his level x 3 units within units / 8 range.

Units with this promotion are slightly fanatical and gain 15% strength, plus the ability to potentially become the Dragon Warrior! Owning dire animals and dragons increase the chance that newly trained living units will start with this promotion.
Treasures give significant financial and resource rewards to the city they are returned to, but will only last 12 turns. Take them to cities that boost gold output to utilize them better.
Treasures give significant financial and resource rewards to the city they are returned to, but will only last 12 turns. Take them to cities that boost gold output to utilize them better.
Treasures give significant financial and resource rewards to the city they are returned to, but will only last 12 turns. Take them to cities that boost gold output to utilize them better.
Burglar promotions help units find the many secret caches throughout Erebus. A potentially very rewarding occupation, if also difficult.
Nobles can judge disputes, sometimes hire enemy units that are lower level than them if they are isolated enough and they can build buildings that increase the economic value of cities.
This animal or beast can poison those it fights with.

The Dragon Warrior is the highest level Cult of the Dragon unit in Erebus. To become the Dragon Warrior, you must be at least level 6. When a unit becomes the Dragon Warrior, the existing Dragon Warrior will lose the title!
